page.title: 20POPULAR MUSIC WEST OF BATH
page.content: At the moment rock music is very popular.There are many kinds of music "pop""robotics", "body-popping"and "break-dancing", each type of music has its own kind of dancing."Pop" is mostly swaying the body and a bit of footwork."Robotics" is jerky music where you have to act like a robot."Body-popping" is really pop but you dance around more. "Break-dance" is mostly a floor dance,the moves are to make you think the dancers are crazy because they spin on their heads and somersault. Most of the musical instruments are electric and some of the key-board instruments can be made to sound like any other instrument. About a quarter of 11 year olds regularly buy pop records. There are many other kinds of music which are popular with different age groups-classical,folk,jazz,chamber etc
